command_string: Power on the microwave. Adjust the upper tube temperature knob to 150°C, select the cooking function as upper and lower heating tube, set the lower tube temperature to 190°C, and set the timer for 20 minutes.

current_observation.variable_function_selection: upper and lower heating tube with convection
